text: @GregAbbott_TX Texas reports 50 new coronavirus deaths,its biggest one-day increase,as state opens.Big Increases again today.We have not met the national guidelines of a two week drop in cases. Is it because the cities are led by democrats that you do not care? Testing is still too low.
